Hi, I am Andre Chang

Work:

Principal Machine Learning leading AI compiler Seattle team at Micron (2019-2023). Co-founder and Deep Learning Compiler Lead at FWDNXT (2017-2019). Research Assistant at Purdue (2014-2017). Research Intern at Sonoscan (2015). Check out my resume for more details.

Education:

I am a PhD from Purdue University in Electrical and Computer Engineering (2019). I got Bachelors from UTFPR in Electrical Engineering (2014).

My research interests are: compilers, hardware accelerators, reinforcement learning, neural architecture search, video generation and deep learning. My goal is to contribute to the development of better AI systems. Check out my PAPERS and my Scholar profile for more details.

Hobby:

I like to paint. Check out my paintings on instagram or in ART. See my projects on Github. My 3D models are shared in thingverse
